event.title: was founded by Thomas Gale and Cornelius Gilmore on June 28, 1838

data.event: Angola was founded by Thomas Gale and Cornelius Gilmore on June 28, 1838, and is home to Trine University.
The National Weather Service reports that Angola's average January temperatures are a maximum of 28.8 °F (−1.8 °C) and a minimum of 13.7 °F (−10.2 °C).
The record low temperature was −27 °F (−33 °C) on January 4, 1981.
